agent_info.agent_output: Hello yash, how can I help you today?

agent_response:
I understand you're having trouble with missing rewards. I'll be glad to assist. Please try the following steps on your Desktop with Mac OS version 10.15.7:

1.  First, please try refreshing the game. Close it completely and then restart it.
2.  Next, check your internet connection to ensure it is stable.
3.  Finally, please ensure your game is updated to the latest version.

Let me know if this helps.

{"status":"Success","faqs_list":[{"title":"Mission disappeared? - How do you claim rewards not awarded after mission completion?","faq_body":"Do you need help with missions not showing up or rewards not being credited after you've completed a mission in your favorite mobile game? Missions are an exciting feature that offers additional challenges with the promise of great rewards. What to do if issues arise? Even the best games have their fair share of hiccups now and then. If you encounter issues where missions aren't appearing or rewards seem to vanish into the digital ether, here are some steps you can take to resolve these problems: Step 1: Refresh Your Game Sometimes, all you need is a simple refresh. Close the game entirely and restart it. This action can help reload the game's resources and bring back missing missions or rewards to light. Step 2: Check Your Connection An unstable internet connection can also be a culprit. Make sure your device is connected to a reliable network. Try toggling your Wi-Fi or data connection off and on to reset your internet link. Step 3: Update the Game Game developers regularly release updates to fix bugs and improve your gaming experience. Head over to your app store to check for any updates for your game. Contact our Support Team: When you've tried the troubleshooting steps and the issue still isn't resolved, it's time to contact our support team. Be prepared with a detailed explanation of the issue, your user ID, and any screenshots you can provide. This information will assist the support team in understanding the problem and helping you reclaim your rewards or access the missions."},{"title":"📊 Tracking Your Rewards Journey","faq_body":"🔍 How to Check Your Progress Staying on top of your progress is essential to maximizing your Huuuge Rewards experience! Here's your simple step-by-step guide: 📱 Your Progress Dashboard 🚀 Open Your Game: Launch the Huuuge game application on your device 🏠 Navigate to Lobby: Head to the main Lobby and look for the 'Huuuge Rewards' icon in the lower right corner 📊 View Your Status: Inside the Huuuge Rewards section, you'll see an exciting progress bar showing your current Card, points, and how close you are to the next tier 🔍 Detailed Information: Tap the \"All Cards Overview\" button for comprehensive details about your Huuuge Points and upcoming rewards 💡 Smart Progress Tips 🔄 How Often Should I Check? Check your progress regularly to stay updated on your rewards and exciting upcoming benefits! It's also a fantastic way to set gameplay goals by aiming for the next reward level. ⚠️ Progress Issues? If you notice any discrepancies, first ensure you're connected to the internet and that no game updates are pending. If problems persist, our amazing customer support team is ready to help! 🎆 Transparency You Can Trust The Huuuge Rewards system is completely transparent, giving you easy access to check your status anytime within the game environment. With just a few taps, you'll have complete insights into what you've achieved and all the exciting rewards ahead! Enjoy your gameplay and remember - every action you take gets you closer to your next incredible Huuuge reward! 🌟"},{"title":"🎁 Understanding Rewards & Collection","faq_body":"🏆 Your Complete Reward Guide Master the art of reward collection to ensure you never miss out on your hard-earned conquest prizes! 👑 Tournament Rewards (Automatic) 🥇 Top 3 Clubs: Clubs with the most Power Rings win Grand Rewards 📊 Personal Share: Individual rewards based on your contribution to the Tournament ⚡ Automatic Delivery: Rewards added directly to your account when Conquest ends ⚔️ Challenge Rewards (Manual Collection) 🎯 Individual Battles: Each challenge has its own reward system 🏆 Winner Takes All: Only the club with most Power Rings wins each challenge 🤝 Shared Victory: Club members share rewards based on their contributions 📱 Manual Collection: Must be collected from the Challenges Summary window ⏰ Critical Collection Timeline 🕐 24-Hour Window: You have 24 hours after Conquest ends to collect challenge rewards ⏱️ Processing Time: Rewards may take a few minutes to appear after challenge completion 🔄 Quick Fix: Restart the app if rewards don't appear immediately Rally your clubmates, strategize meticulously, and embark on the path to glorious Conquest! Let the club with the most brilliant strategies and unwavering dedication claim the mantle of Conquest Champions! 👑"}]}

agent_response:
Thank you for supporting our game. I’m sorry to hear that you are having trouble with your payment. I’ll be glad to assist. To help me investigate this for you, could you please provide the following information?

- Approximate purchase date
- Item name
- Platform or storefront (e.g., App Store, Google Play)
- Approximate purchase amount

{"status":"Success","instruction":"----------------------------------------------------------------
PURCHASE OR PAYMENT ISSUE RESOLUTION INSTRUCTIONS
----------------------------------------------------------------

**ALWAYS follow the below steps in order for purchase or payment issue resolution. Do not merge or skip any steps.**
1. Begin by thanking the user for supporting the game and apologize for the inconvenience.
2. If purchase details are missing, request ONLY non-sensitive information, such as:
   - approximate purchase date
   - item name
   - platform or storefront
   - approximate purchase amount
   **Note: Never request or confirm sensitive information or payment credentials.**
3. Review if any available information from **Platform Information** or **Player Information** along with the purchase details can be used to identify relevant insights, confirmations, or errors regarding the purchase.
   DO NOT speculate or infer missing information.
4. If no relevant information is available, perform FAQ search by calling the `get_faqs` tool to see if FAQ results can be used to provide a resolution.
5. If even FAQ results cannot provide any resolution, advise the user to review their bank or app-store transaction history to confirm whether the payment succeeded or failed.
   Do not reference internal systems, knowledge sources, FAQ results or troubleshooting origins.
6. If the transaction/payment was succeeded on the user’s side:
   - Follow the escalation guidelines and escalate by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool using the **outside_ai_agent_capability** fallback config.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the current analysis.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to deliver a reassuring message to the user that their payment is secure and currently being verified.
   - Do not resolve or reject prematurely.
7. If the transaction failed on the user’s side:
   - Reject the issue by calling the `action_agent_tool` tool.
      - Use the **pvt_note_content** tool parameter to log findings and summarizing the failure condition.
      - Use the **display_content** tool parameter to construct a user response as respectfully informing the user that no completed purchase is recorded and asking them to check with their payment provider if needed.

----------------------------------------------------------------
CRITICAL SAFETY AND LANGUAGE RULES FOR THIS USE CASE
----------------------------------------------------------------
- Never request sensitive personal data (bank details, card numbers, emails, IDs, full names, etc.).
- Never claim access to financial systems or banking records.
- Never confirm root cause unless explicitly supported by validated data.
- Never generalize or guess about loss, refunds, charge status, or timing.
- Never imply certainty about refund or transaction status without confirmation."}

user_message: How can I talk to someone in private?
agent_response:
Hello amit, if you want to talk to someone in private in the game, you can start a private table and invite the person you want to chat with.

If you are facing an issue, please provide me with more details so I can assist you.
